text: Mgbanwe n'ọdịdị na-agbakwunye ọdịdị kejenetiki ọhụrụ, ma nhọpụta na-ewepụ ya n'ogwu ọdịdị nke a kọwapụtara.

English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Igbo: Ọdụ ụgbọ nọ n’eluụwa ahụ nọgidere na-akpa àgwà, n'agbanyeghị ofufu gyroscope na mbụ na ozi ọdụ ụgbọ nọ n’eluụwa, ruo na njedebe nke ịga ije n’elu ụwa. 
English: The submarines were very maneuverable, despite the lack of a gyroscope and the fact that the first submarines could not send messages underwater, until the end of the war.
clean_output: The submarines were very maneuverable, despite the lack of a gyroscope and the fact that the first submarines could not send messages underwater, until the end of the war.

Igbo: Na mbido agha ha nọ na-aga naanị n’elu mmiri mana a ihe nnataozi n'ikuku bidoro rụwa ọrụ nke ọma ụgbọokpurummiri enweghizi ihe ọzọ ọ ga-eme n'abụghị ịgbada n'okpuru mmiri ka a ghara ịhụ ya. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Igbo: Apia bụ isi obodo Samoa. Obodo ahụ nọ n'agwaetiti Upolu ma ma nwee ngụpụta mmadụ nke ji obere ihe ghara eru 40,000. 
English: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The city is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.
clean_output: The city is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000. Apia is the capital of Samoa.
